snippet: von MEHREN--Robert B. The Board of Trustees and staff of Practising Law Institute (PLI) mourn the passing of long time Trustee, Board Chairman, Executive Committee Chairman and Chairman Emeritus, Robert B. von Mehren. Robert was an active contributor to PLI, co-author of PLI's "American Arbitration: Principles and Practice", speaker at PLI programs and an ongoing supporter of continuing legal education. We will miss his wise counsel and wisdom. Our sympathies to his family at this time. William P. Frank, Board Chair Samuel W. Seymour, Executive Committee Chair Anita C. Shapiro, President 1/3
